bill.summary: 10/3/1994--Passed House amended. Instructs the Comptroller General to appoint as the Executive Director of the General Accounting Office (GAO) Personnel Appeals Board (the Board) an individual that the Chairman of that Board selects. Modifies the pay rate guidelines for the Board's General Counsel. Authorizes the Comptroller General to enter into interagency agreements with the Department of State and other executive agencies to permit GAO to participate in health care programs for Federal employees stationed or performing temporary duty abroad.
